issue_description: User requested a password reset but the link received in the email leads to a 404 error page. Affects access to the application.
Customer paid for the 'Pro' tier but their account is still displaying the 'Basic' features and limits.
The sales tax applied to the January invoice is incorrect based on the customer's region/VAT ID.
When attempting to finalize a purchase on the Android app (version 4.2), the app freezes indefinitely on the final checkout screen.
Customer reports that orders placed prior to December 2023 are no longer visible in their account's order history section.
Uploading a new profile picture fails about 50% of the time with a generic 'Upload Error' message.
Customer attempted to change their billing address, the change saves momentarily, but then reverts to the old address upon refreshing the page.
The toggle to turn off subscription auto-renewal appears greyed out or disabled in the account settings page.
Customer was charged twice for the same monthly subscription fee on 1/29/2024. Requests a refund for the duplicate charge.
Clicking the 'Download' button for the annual account statement for 2023 results in a corrupted or empty PDF file.
